title: Just Received a Permanent Ban
body:
Hello Fellow Summoners. My logs will be below. I was wondering what in them constituted a permanent ban? In my opinion, it was marginal trash talk in the  chat log #2 but the 1st chat log was me trying to keep my team from surrendering and trying to stop a Kai'Sa from intentional feeding by warning them about the ability to be permanently banned.  Game #2 happened a few days ago (i believe) and Game #1 happened this morning.  I am still mentally processing everything and hope someone can shed light on what exactly in Game #1 triggered the ban (other than the player report and whatever it is that they wrote)?  My team was literally ahead by a very great margin other than our bot lane whom i planned on helping very soon.  I do have a ticket in but I am going to let the internet assault me with the brutal honesty first before they will probably be able to get back to me.


Game 1
Pre-Game
Nevruary: you can get me Sylas
Nevruary: I own all and dont care for counter
In-Game
Nevruary: fun
Nevruary: calm down
Nevruary: yall win bot lane at 6
Nevruary: 99% sure yall win at 6
Nevruary: relax
Nevruary: go bot
Nevruary: please
Nevruary: do not troll
Nevruary: i am ahead
Nevruary: really?
Nevruary: so you int my lane because you're upset?
Nevruary: i did nothing to you
Nevruary: kai sa
Nevruary: please
Nevruary: do not int my lane
Nevruary: int bot lane
Nevruary: wtv
Nevruary: wtf
Nevruary: why
Nevruary: are you inting me?
Nevruary: really?
Nevruary: kai sa
Nevruary: stop inting
Nevruary: you can get perma banned
Nevruary: mute her and play please
Nevruary: stop inting
Nevruary: play
Nevruary: everyone
Nevruary: sigh
Nevruary: this is unreal
Nevruary: we were winning too
Nevruary: like
Nevruary: this akali is actual trash
Nevruary: and you int for no reason
Nevruary: Kai sa
Nevruary: you're getting banned lol
Nevruary: why int
Nevruary: doesnt matter
Nevruary: she isnt inting
Nevruary: you are
Nevruary: you're getting banned
Nevruary: hey
Nevruary: not everyone is equally skilled
Nevruary: you cant fault her
Nevruary: if she passive
Nevruary: like i said
Nevruary: 1st
Nevruary: stop typing in caps
Nevruary: 2nd
Nevruary: stop inting
Nevruary: 3rd
Nevruary: we can win
Nevruary: mk
Nevruary: enjoy your ban
Nevruary: there wont be a next game for you
Nevruary: you are litearlly getting banned
Nevruary: riot bans now
Nevruary: for actual int
Nevruary: like
Nevruary: lol
Nevruary: it's one thing to have a bad teammate
Nevruary: inting is another
Nevruary: and is bannable
Nevruary: you will get banned
Nevruary: and it can be perma
Nevruary: you lose the account
Nevruary: and all the skins
Nevruary: why risk that shit?
Nevruary: and?
Nevruary: they can IP ban fam
Nevruary: this isnt a joke
Nevruary: you have no idea lol
Nevruary: lol
Nevruary: their team is trash]
Nevruary: and yall want to ff
Nevruary: so
Nevruary: when you can longer play league
Nevruary: then what?
Post-Game
Nevruary: it's sad
Nevruary: yall prob wouldve lost
Nevruary: even if she just farmed under turret
Game 2
In-Game
Nevruary: taht name./..
Nevruary: sec
Nevruary: i need to buy
Nevruary: clear the ward
Nevruary: red then bot
Nevruary: didnt know he had ult
Nevruary: lol
Nevruary: i tried
Nevruary: good luck
Nevruary: wow
Nevruary: it really isnt
Nevruary: what's inting
Nevruary: is me wasting time mid
Nevruary: when Fizz is trash
Nevruary: couldve had you or bot fed
Nevruary: im not coming mid
Nevruary: ever again
Nevruary: lol
Nevruary: thought he would flash
Nevruary: calm down
Nevruary: lol
Nevruary: no one moves on this team otehr than nami
Nevruary: give
Nevruary: ocean has 0 impact on teamfights
Nevruary: tad late for that
Nevruary: he doesnt like yall bot lane lol
Nevruary: RAMMUS INC MID
Nevruary: lol
Nevruary: no comment
Nevruary: lol
Nevruary: recall quick
Nevruary: sivir get red
Nevruary: all top
Nevruary: lol
Nevruary: ^
Nevruary: and kayle has arrived
Nevruary: lol
Nevruary: had no choice
Nevruary: rammus was coming
Nevruary: lol
Nevruary: fam
Nevruary: had
Nevruary: no
Nevruary: choice
Nevruary: someone was dying
Nevruary: what part
Nevruary: of rammus was going in
Nevruary: was not clear?
Nevruary: lol
Nevruary: lol
Nevruary: and do what?
Nevruary: game's been over really
Nevruary: THAT
Nevruary: right there
Nevruary: what just happened to fiora lifebar
Nevruary: is why we lose
Nevruary: vote yes
Nevruary: move on
Nevruary: and next time
Nevruary: dont queue mid if you have no idea what you're doing
Nevruary: yupp
Nevruary: hmm
Nevruary: my items arent enough for her lol
Nevruary: lol
Nevruary: lol fucking l
Nevruary: useless mid laner
Nevruary: on a great champ
Nevruary: sad af
Post-Game
Nevruary: ping me all you want
Nevruary: Fizz was weakest link
Nevruary: legit
Nevruary: trash bag

I understand the chances are slim on the ban getting reversed but I am going to try anyways.  Good luck to the rest of you on the rift.

replies.body:
> I was wondering what in them constituted a permanent ban?

You need to think about it this way. Valid reports for in-game toxicity don't result in 10-game chat restrictions, 25-game chat restrictions, 14-day suspensions, or permanent bans. They result in **the next level of punishment**. Was your last punishment a 14-day suspension? Then yes, these chat logs constitute a permanent ban.

I started reading the log for Game 1, and saw constant accusations of Kai'Sa inting, claiming repeatedly that she'll be banned, calling Akali trash, "you're getting banned," "enjoy your ban," and it _kept going_. Game 2 is more of the same. When you got a 14-day ban, it specifically and clearly warned you that any negative behavior would result in a ban. Do you think that constant arguments, insults, and harassment are friendly, helpful, positive behaviors? 100% deserved punishment; you're not getting it reversed.
I was also curious how long other people who have received a permanent ban and tried to have to reversed had to wait for the "Human" Response.
Generally, support teams respond within 24-48 hours. In rare cases where there are a lot of tickets or on weekends it can be longer.
It’s an unfortunate situation but look at it as an opportunity to self improve and not let people get under your skin.

> [{quoted}](name=mack9112,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nYAw8nGo,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2019-05-09T00:26:28.910+0000)
>
> It’s an unfortunate situation but look at it as an opportunity to self improve and not let people get under your skin.

Yea, if the ban is permanent, i think it is more so the loss of skins and the struggle of getting that account out of silver that will be missed lol.  It isn't looking too good for the reversal but I'm going to try anyways and 100% just muting all and keeping it moving.
I bet on your next account you will be get gold pretty quick so that’s a plus :)
Game one, nothing really, game two, you were insulting your allies

> [{quoted}](name=Jamaree,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nYAw8nGo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-05-09T00:01:14.737+0000)
>
> Game one, nothing really, game two, you were insulting your allies

Game 2 I understand (I guess) but Game 1 does not make sense and is what the ban triggered off of.

> [{quoted}](name=Nevruary,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nYAw8nGo,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-05-09T00:10:05.049+0000)
>
> Game 2 I understand (I guess) but Game 1 does not make sense and is what the ban triggered off of.

 Not how that works actually, reports work on a build up and once you hit a certain threshold, you are then punished, starts with a chat restriction and builds to a permaban.

The system doesn’t show you all the games you were reported in, just a few samples.

You had a 14 day ban in the beginning-middle April timeframe. About one month later, you are already resorting to flaming your teammates, blaming them, harassing them, threatening punishments on them, etc. None of that behavior is acceptable, and your 14 day ban stated very clearly that any further misbehavior would result in a permanent ban.

> [{quoted}](name=rujitra,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nYAw8nGo,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-05-09T00:05:13.947+0000)
>
> You had a 14 day ban in the beginning-middle April timeframe. About one month later, you are already resorting to flaming your teammates, blaming them, harassing them, threatening punishments on them, etc. None of that behavior is acceptable, and your 14 day ban stated very clearly that any further misbehavior would result in a permanent ban.

Didn't realize I was threatening but thank you for the feedback.

> [{quoted}](name=addurk,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nYAw8nGo,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-05-09T00:01:19.123+0000)
>
> join the club. I've gotten like 20

Not trying to "join" any club of that nature lol.
Game 1 you made accusations of inting 11 times.  True or not, that would be considered harassment.

If you got a 14-day ban then yes this was worth a 10 game chat restrictions which will simply stack to a perma. But if not, I don't think this was worth a perma. You insulted your teammates with a bit of pepper.

> [{quoted}](name=G Master Hung,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nYAw8nGo,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-05-09T00:05:33.930+0000)
>
> If you got a 14-day ban then yes this was worth a 10 game chat restrictions which will simply stack to a perma. But if not, I don't think this was worth a perma. You insulted your teammates with a bit of pepper.

"With bit of pepper".  Guess I'm playing without seasonings going forward then.

> [{quoted}](name=G Master Hung,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nYAw8nGo,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-05-09T00:05:33.930+0000)
>
> If you got a 14-day ban then yes this was worth a 10 game chat restrictions which will simply stack to a perma. But if not, I don't think this was worth a perma. You insulted your teammates with a bit of pepper.

This is not how the punishment system works in the slightest. You are spreading misinformation.
